Discovery transaction” — and demanding answers about how his company has interacted with President Trump and the White House in its hostile takeover bid […]

title: Bill Hader To Make Feature Directorial Debut With MRC Horror Film ‘They Know’

Title: Bill Hader To Make Feature Directorial Debut With MRC Horror Film ‘They Know’
Summary: In his first outing behind the camera since Barry, his Emmy-winning dark comedy for HBO, Bill Hader has officially locked in plans to write, direct and star in They Know, a new horror film for MRC, which will begin production in Los Angeles this spring. Title: ‘Bridgerton’s Yerin Ha Named Ambassador For SAG-AFTRA’s 32nd Annual Actor Awards
